pattern.name: Country Selector
pattern.author: Martijn van Welie
pattern.problem: Users need to go from a global site to a country-specific website
pattern.context: Not to be confused with the ...typical for
pattern.pattlet: Place a language, and region, selector on the home-page.
pattern.solution: Use a pulldown if there is not so much space for the language selector. Otherwise list them so that users can select the appropriate country directly. List the countries alphabetically.
pattern.rationale: Sometimes the international site functions as a proxy to the country sites. If that is the only purpose a link listing is the clearest solution that provides one click access. If the international site contains other information such as corporate information, the language selector can become just a boxed pulldown that is one of the page elements.
